title: The dovvnfall of Mercurius Britannicus. Pragmaticus. Politicus. That three headed cerberus.
publicationDate: Printed in the year that the saints are disappointed, 1660
notes: Verse - "That proverb which of late by him was spoken".
The words "Britannicus .. Politicus" are bracketed together in title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
